Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 125th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2006...
Injured on 6/3/2007 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Baltimore to Los Angeles (A) on 1/31/2008 (Going to BAL: P B. Wood, 1B B. Synder. Going to LAA: P J. Vargas, SS E. Burriss)...
Had first career hit on 9/9/2008, off Bill Simas (BAL)...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2009...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2010...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Minnesota on 4/23/2011 (Going to MIN: P Y. Lara, P T. McKnight, P T. Tucker, 2B E. Burriss, RF A. Dunn. Going to LAA: P M. Segura)...
Injured on 8/12/2011 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Injured on 7/30/2012 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 6/15/2013, off Daniel Bard (SEA)...
Injured on 8/31/2013 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/17/2015 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/4/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/18/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $725,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 4/24/2022 to a minor league deal...
